description:
Videogular is a new way to bring video to the web. Thanks to the power of AngularJS we can create our custom tags and attributes to provide an HTML5 API for web designers. Learn in this workshop how to play VOD videos, live streamings and to create your own plugins!

Slides: http://slides.com/elecash/deck
title: Videogular and the future of HTML5 video by Raul Jimenez at NG-NL 2015
